messages.message: Also we currently use our aws key to mount S3 drives across into IB environments. How will that change work now?
Is your s3 bucket policy written to specifically reference your IAM user? And by mount you mean using NFS or something else? If you give me the bucket name / AWS account I’m happy to take a look.

the IB file system allows users to mount drives across multiple environments https://instabase.com/docs/infra-admin/workspace-mounts/mounting-drives/#amazon-s3

previously, we were told to do so using our AWS credentials (ex: https://docs.google.com/document/d/11ExENh4Y-xvrg4zr23zN05GnvK-vZVy3_AvGcwJHiYg/edit#heading=h.4ns95tjyhu8)

cc <!subteam^S01DXHX6FPT> does this mean that all S3 drives mounted by engineers won’t work after 4/7?
Appreciate the extra info here! Ashish also just demoed this use-case for me. We don't yet have a solution yet but will be looking into this.
